column1: The hospital should have modern, up-to-date equipment
column2: The hospital's physical facilities should be clean and visually appealing (reception, waiting area, consultation rooms, toilets, wards)
column3: The hospital's employees should be well-dressed and have a neat and professional appearance
column4: Materials associated with the service should be visually appealing
column5: When a hospital employee promises to do something by a particular time, they should do it
column6: When a patient has a problem, the hospital's employees should show a sincere interest in solving it
column7: The hospital should provide its services at the time it promises to do
column8: The hospital should always get things right the first time
column9: The hospital should maintain accurate and error-free records
column10: The hospital's employees should tell the patient exactly when services will be performed
column11: The hospital's employees should provide prompt service to patients
column12: The hospital's employees should always be willing to help patients
column13: The hospital's employees should never be too busy to respond to patients' requests
column14: The behaviour and attitudes of hospital employees should instill confidence in patients
column15: Patients should feel safe in all their dealings with the hospital and its employees
column16: Hospital employees should be consistently courteous to patients
column17: Hospital employees should be knowledgeable and able to answer patients' questions
column18: The hospital should give each patient individualised attention
column19: The hospital's employees should express care in their interaction with patients
column20: The hospital and its employees should have the patients' best interests at heart
column21: The hospital's employees should understand the specific needs of each of their patients
column22: The operating hours of the hospital should be convenient for all its patients
